name: Groundbreaker (Ludum Dare 48)
description:
A Ludum Dare 48 submission. Download the game for the best performance, graphics, and audio quality.

Your goal in Groundbreaker, as the title says, is to break ground, and get as deep as possible. As you get deeper you will discover more and more spooky wicked enemies. You can also unlock 8 achievements, and compete with other players' high scores on the leaderboard!

v1.1 Changelog:
  • Fixed high score value getting overrode every time, even if you had a lower score than your current high score.
  • Fixed enemies damaging you even if they were dead.
  • Fixed collisions of walls.
  • Fixed blood energy stacking after reaching its limit.
  • Added a mouse sensitivity option so that you don't have to change it manually.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Look - Mouse Movement

Hit/Shoot - LMB

Pickaxe - 1 key

Hammer - 2 key

Pistol - 3 key

Credits:

All 3D models, textures, effects, and code made by Danial Jumagaliyev (me).

Sound effects are all from zapsplat.com

Music by TeknoAxe.
